comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: How good is this! Google "Joshua's Boomerang Brandy" to get an advert in the Sydney Morning Herald on 30 July 1897 - news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1301&dat=18970730&... This is a reverse view of this photo - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2713156400/

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I'll acknowledge your excitement on [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/]'s behalf: Très, très bien!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet] Ha! That was 22 months ago, when I was young and innocent (ignorant?), and Trove hadn't been invented.  At the time is was amazing ...

22 months ago Google newspapers did not go far enough back for most of these photos, but I see that it does now.  It is much clearer to read than Trove, and doesn't seem yo rely on that program which suffers hugely from misspellings needing correction.  Worth further investigation ...
